title: Monty Mole

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Excavate**: Dig under someone, you will hear all their whispers until you use this on another target.
- **Main Tunnel**: Dig under Bowser's castle for this night, Learning the roles of Koopa visitors in addition to your Attribute. (2 uses)
- **Dust and Rubble**: Throw up enough sand to start a sandstorm, Good Investigative roles will recieve no feedback tonight. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - While you are alive, Learn the names of everyone who visits a Koopa member.

desc:
Post 1417
*Monty Moles are rock-throwing moles, big time mischief-makers.*
